name: schwaarzt lach
description:
schwaarzt lach

- tr. (lux) - "black hole".

contemplating god, death and the universe.
a semi-autobiographical vignette about grief, made in bitsy. 

how to play:
arrow keys to move & interact.
if unresponsive at first, please click inside the game window.
(& follow the sparkles.)

content warnings:
death of a loved one by car accident, brief mention of suicidal ideation, swearing/strong language, discussion of God as an allegory (from an atheist/agnostic perspective)

language:
english

playtime:
~ 20 mins, depending on reading speed

music credits:
fryeri by kai engel, courtesy of the free music archive
